name: Quake: Retro Jam Egyptian
summary:
Retro Jam - Egyptian is the sixth Retro Jam organized at Func_Msgboard - featuring 17 small to medium-sized Egyptian-themed levels by various authors. It comes with custom visuals for the items and several skyboxes. Retro Jams are map packs designed for vanilla Quake and can be played with an unmodified engine.

This map pack is one of the biggest ever made, at 52615 Kilobytes, lasting up to six hours of playtime.
